Package business

Class MatchManager

java.lang.Object
business.MatchManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
MatchInterface, Observer
public class MatchManager extends Object implements Observer, MatchInterface
The MatchManager class handles the management and simulation of matches. It implements the Observer interface to receive updates from matches. It also implements the MatchInterface for match operations.

  • Method Details

    • startMatchSimulator

      public void startMatchSimulator()
      Starts the match simulator by retrieving matches from the database and simulating those that are due for simulation. It schedules periodic updates of the match simulator.
      Specified by:
      startMatchSimulator in interface MatchInterface

    • stopMatchSimulator

      public void stopMatchSimulator()
      Stops the match simulator by removing all matches from simulation.
      Specified by:
      stopMatchSimulator in interface MatchInterface

    • updateMatchSimulator

      public void updateMatchSimulator()
      Updates the match simulator by retrieving new matches from the database and simulating those that are due for simulation.
      Specified by:
      updateMatchSimulator in interface MatchInterface

    • update

      public void update(Observable o, Object arg)
      This function updates from observed matches. It updates the match result in the database, updates the score, and notifies the main controller for view updates.
      Specified by:
      update in interface Observer
      Parameters:
      o - the observed match object
      arg - the update argument (not used in this implementation)

    • getUserMatches

      public ArrayList<Match> getUserMatches(User user)
      Retrieves matches associated with the given user. If the user is null, it returns all matches in simulation.
      Specified by:
      getUserMatches in interface MatchInterface
      Parameters:
      user - the user to retrieve matches for
      Returns:
      the list of matches associated with the user

    • updateScore

      public void updateScore(Match match)
      Updates the score based on the result of the given match. It updates the scores of the winning and losing teams in the league.
      Specified by:
      updateScore in interface MatchInterface
      Parameters:
      match - the match to update the score for

    • setController

      public void setController(MainController mainController)
      Sets the main controller for this MatchManager.
      Specified by:
      setController in interface MatchInterface
      Parameters:
      mainController - the main controller to set

    • forceCloseMatchesByLeague

      public void forceCloseMatchesByLeague(String leagueName)
      Forces closing of matches associated with the given league.
      Parameters:
      leagueName - the name of the league to force close matches for

      public void forceCloseMatchesByTeam(String teamName)
